  • Uses of Bounds3 in camzup.core

    Fields in camzup.core declared as Bounds3 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Bounds3 Octree.bounds
    The bounding volume.
    Methods in camzup.core that return Bounds3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Bounds3 Curve3.calcBounds​(Curve3 curve, Bounds3 target)
    Calculates an Axis-Aligned Bounding Box (AABB) encompassing the curve.
    static Bounds3 Mesh3.calcBounds​(Mesh3 mesh, Bounds3 target)
    Calculates an Axis-Aligned Bounding Box (AABB) encompassing the mesh.
    static Bounds3 Bounds3.cieLab​(Bounds3 target)
    Returns a boundary encompassing the CIE L*a*b* color space, with a minimum at (-110.0, -110.0, -1.0) and a maximum of (110.0, 110.0, 101.0).
    static Bounds3 Bounds3.fromCenterExtent​(Vec3 center, Vec3 extent, Bounds3 target)
    Creates a bounding volume from a center and the volume's extent.
    static Bounds3 Bounds3.fromCenterHalfExtent​(Vec3 center, Vec3 he, Bounds3 target)
    Creates a bounding volume from a center and half the volume's extent.
    static Bounds3 Bounds3.fromPoints​(Vec3[] points, Bounds3 target)
    Sets a bounding volume to encompass an array of points.
    Bounds3 Bounds3.grow​(Vec3 v)
    Grows this bounds so as to include a point.
    Bounds3 Bounds3.growToInclude​(Vec3 v)
    Grows this bounds so as to include a point.
    Bounds3 Bounds3.scale​(float v)
    Scales a bounding volume from its center.
    Bounds3 Bounds3.scale​(Vec3 v)
    Scales a bounding volume from its center.
    Bounds3 Bounds3.set​(float min, float max)
    Sets the components of this bounding area with scalars.
    Bounds3 Bounds3.set​(float xMin, float yMin, float zMin, float xMax, float yMax, float zMax)
    Sets the components of this bounding volume.
    Bounds3 Bounds3.set​(Bounds3 source)
    Sets this bounds to the components of a source bounds.
    Bounds3 Bounds3.set​(Vec3 min, Vec3 max)
    Sets the components of this bounding volume.
    Bounds3 Bounds3.shrink​(Vec3 v)
    Shrinks this bounds so as to exclude a point.
    Bounds3 Bounds3.shrinkToExclude​(Vec3 v)
    Shrinks this bounds so as to exclude a point.
    Bounds3 Bounds3.translate​(Vec3 v)
    Translates this bounds by a vector.
    static Bounds3 Bounds3.unitCubeSigned​(Bounds3 target)
    Returns a boundary encompassing a signed unit cube in the range [-1.0, 1.0] .
    static Bounds3 Bounds3.unitCubeUnsigned​(Bounds3 target)
    Returns a boundary encompassing an unsigned unit cube in the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    Bounds3 Bounds3.verify()
    Verifies that all components of minimum are less than those of the maximum, and that the minimums and maximums do not equal each other.

    int Bounds3.compareTo​(Bounds3 b)
    Compares two bounds according to their center points.
    static boolean Bounds3.contains​(Bounds3 b, Vec3 v)
    Evaluates whether a point is within the bounding volume, lower bounds inclusive, upper bounds exclusive.
    static Vec3 Bounds3.contains​(Bounds3 b, Vec3 v, Vec3 target)
    Evaluates whether a point is within the bounding volume, lower bounds inclusive upper bounds exclusive.
    static boolean Bounds3.containsExclusive​(Bounds3 b, Vec3 v)
    Evaluates whether a point is within the bounding volume, excluding the bound's edges (i.e., the evaluation is made with greater than and less than).
    static Vec3 Bounds3.containsExclusive​(Bounds3 b, Vec3 v, Vec3 target)
    Evaluates whether a point is within the bounding volume, excluding the bound's edges (i.e., the evaluation is made with greater than and less than).

    A boolean vector is returned; useful for cases where a point may be contained in one dimension but not in another.
    static boolean Bounds3.containsInclusive​(Bounds3 b, Vec3 v)
    Evaluates whether a point is within the bounding volume, including the bound's edges (i.e., the evaluation is made with greater than or equal to and less than or equal to).
    static Vec3 Bounds3.containsInclusive​(Bounds3 b, Vec3 v, Vec3 target)
    Evaluates whether a point is within the bounding volume, including the bound's edges (i.e., the evaluation is made with greater than or equal to and less than or equal to).

    A boolean vector is returned; useful for cases where a point may be contained in one dimension but not in another.
    static Vec3 Bounds3.extent​(Bounds3 b, Vec3 target)
    Finds the extent of the bounds, the absolute difference between its minimum and maximum corners.
    static Bounds3 Bounds3.fromCenterExtent​(Vec3 center, Vec3 extent, Bounds3 target)
    Creates a bounding volume from a center and the volume's extent.
    static Bounds3 Bounds3.fromCenterHalfExtent​(Vec3 center, Vec3 he, Bounds3 target)
    Creates a bounding volume from a center and half the volume's extent.
    static Bounds3 Bounds3.fromPoints​(Vec3[] points, Bounds3 target)
    Sets a bounding volume to encompass an array of points.
    static Vec3 Bounds3.halfExtent​(Bounds3 b, Vec3 target)
    Finds half the extent of the bounds.
    static boolean Bounds3.intersect​(Bounds3 a, Bounds3 b)
    Evaluates whether two bounding volumes intersect.
    static Vec3 Bounds3.intersect​(Bounds3 a, Bounds3 b, Vec3 target)
    Evaluates whether two bounding volumes intersect.
    static boolean Bounds3.intersect​(Bounds3 a, Vec3 center, float radius)
    Evaluates whether a bounding volume intersects a sphere.
    Vec3[] Octree.query​(Bounds3 range)
    Queries the octree with a rectangular range, returning points inside the range.
    Bounds3 Bounds3.set​(Bounds3 source)
    Sets this bounds to the components of a source bounds.
    static void Bounds3.split​(Bounds3 b, float xFac, float yFac, float zFac, Bounds3 bsw, Bounds3 bse, Bounds3 bnw, Bounds3 bne, Bounds3 fsw, Bounds3 fse, Bounds3 fnw, Bounds3 fne)
    Splits a bounding volume into eight octants according to three factors in the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    static void Bounds3.split​(Bounds3 b, Bounds3 bsw, Bounds3 bse, Bounds3 bnw, Bounds3 bne, Bounds3 fsw, Bounds3 fse, Bounds3 fnw, Bounds3 fne)
    Splits a bounding volume into octants.
    static boolean Bounds3.split​(Bounds3 b, Vec3 v, Bounds3 bsw, Bounds3 bse, Bounds3 bnw, Bounds3 bne, Bounds3 fsw, Bounds3 fse, Bounds3 fnw, Bounds3 fne)
    Splits a bounding volume into eight octants according to a point.
    static Bounds3 Bounds3.unitCubeSigned​(Bounds3 target)
